Properties.string: Send your opponents to the realm of shadows...
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Make sure that the portal kills Godded people once within range
--Fixed by TakeoHonorable --Fixed the gravitation issue with the black hole local Seed = Random.new()
local Wait,NextInteger,huge,Instant,Type,Pairs = wait,Seed.NextInteger,math.huge,Instance.new,type,pairs
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instant(ty) for k, v in Pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
local Self = script
local world = workspace
local Tool = Self.Parent Tool.Enabled = true
local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
local Remote = (Tool:FindFirstChildOfClass("RemoteEvent") or Create("RemoteEvent"){ Name = "Remote", Parent = Tool })
local Particle = Handle:WaitForChild("Particle")
Particle.Enabled = true
local Player,Character,Humanoid
local Sounds = { Equip = Handle:WaitForChild("Unsheath"), Slash = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash"), }
local Properties = { Swinging = false, Damage = {Touch = {Min = 7, Max = 11}, Hit = {Min = 16, Max = 22}}, Activating = false, BlackHole_Duration = 15, BlackHole_Range = 150, Special_Cooldown = 40 }
local Events = {}
local Animations = {}
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), InsertService = (game:FindService("InsertService") or game:GetService("InsertService")) }
local R15BaseModel = Services.InsertService:LoadAsset(1664543044) --R15 standard Model local R15Base = R15BaseModel:FindFirstChildOfClass("Model") R15Base.Parent = nil R15BaseModel:Destroy() R15BaseModel = nil
local SkeleBase = R15Base:Clone() if SkeleBase:FindFirstChild("Head") then SkeleBase:FindFirstChild("Head").Transparency = 1 end --[[local BodyColors = Create("BodyColors"){ HeadColor = BrickColor.new("Really black"), RightArmColor = BrickColor.new("Really black"), LeftArmColor = BrickColor.new("Really black"), TorsoColor = BrickColor.new("Really black"), RightLegColor = BrickColor.new("Really black"), LeftLegColor = BrickColor.new("Really black"), Parent = SkeleBase }]]
local SkeleColor = Color3.fromRGB(98, 37, 209) local BodyColors = Create("BodyColors"){ HeadColor3 = SkeleColor, RightArmColor3 = SkeleColor, LeftArmColor3 = SkeleColor, TorsoColor3 = SkeleColor, RightLegColor3 = SkeleColor, LeftLegColor3 = SkeleColor, Parent = SkeleBase }
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "creator", Value = player, } Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in Pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Equipped()
Character = Tool.Parent Player = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or Humanoid.Health == huge or Humanoid.MaxHealth == huge then return end
Animations = Tool:WaitForChild("Animations")
Animations = { Equip = {Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("Equip")), Speed = .7, Duration = .75}, LeftSlash = {Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("LeftSlash")), Speed = 2, Duration = .75}, RightSlash = {Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("RightSlash")), Speed = 2, Duration = .75}, SideSwipe = {Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("SideSwipe")), Speed = .8, Duration = .75}, Summon = {Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("Summon")), Speed = .75, Duration = 1.25}, --Swing = {Animation = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Animations:WaitForChild(Humanoid.RigType.Name):WaitForChild("Swing")), Speed = 1, Duration = 1} }
Animations.Equip.Animation:Play(nil,nil,Animations.Equip.Speed) Sounds.Equip:Play()
local Current_Time = 0 repeat Current_Time = Current_Time + Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until not Tool:IsDescendantOf(Character) or Current_Time >= Animations.Equip.Duration/Animations.Equip.Speed
if not Animations.Equip or Current_Time < Animations.Equip.Duration then return end
Events[#Events+1] = Tool.Activated:Connect(function() if not Tool.Enabled or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or Humanoid.Health == huge or Humanoid.MaxHealth == huge then return end
Tool.Enabled = false Properties.Swinging = true
local AttackAnim = {Animations.LeftSlash,Animations.RightSlash,Animations.SideSwipe} AttackAnim = AttackAnim[NextInteger(Seed,1,#AttackAnim)]
--print(AttackAnim.Animation.Name)
if AttackAnim.Animation then AttackAnim.Animation:Play(nil,nil,(AttackAnim.Animation and AttackAnim.Speed) or 1) end
Sounds.Slash.Pitch = (NextInteger(Seed,1250, 1750) * 0.001) Sounds.Slash:Play()
Wait((AttackAnim and AttackAnim.Animation and AttackAnim.Duration) or 1) Properties.Swinging = false Tool.Enabled = true
end)
Events[#Events+1] = Remote.OnServerEvent:Connect(function(Client,Key) if not Player or not Client or Client ~= Player or not Key or not Tool.Enabled or Properties.Activating then return end
if Key == Enum.KeyCode.Q and Particle.Enabled then Properties.Activating = true
Animations.Summon.Animation:Play(nil,nil,Animations.Summon.Speed) Current_Time = 0 repeat Current_Time = Current_Time + Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until not Tool:IsDescendantOf(Character) or Current_Time >= Animations.Summon.Duration/Animations.Summon.Speed
Properties.Activating = false
if not Tool:IsDescendantOf(Character) then return end
--print("Placing portal here")
local BlackHoleScript = Self:WaitForChild("BlackHoleScript"):Clone()
Create("CFrameValue"){ Name = "Location", Value = (Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")).CFrame * CFrame.new(0,6,-7), Parent = BlackHoleScript }
Create("NumberValue"){ Name = "Duration", Value = Properties.BlackHole_Duration, Parent = BlackHoleScript }
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Character, Parent = BlackHoleScript }
Create("NumberValue"){ Name = "Range", Value = Properties.BlackHole_Range, Parent = BlackHoleScript }
BlackHoleScript.Parent = Services.ServerScriptService BlackHoleScript.Disabled = false
Particle.Enabled = false
delay(Properties.Special_Cooldown, function() Particle.Enabled = true end)
--Place Portal here
end
end)
Events[#Events+1] = Handle.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end
local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField")
if not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0 or FF then return end
Hum:TakeDamage((Properties.Activating and NextInteger(Seed,Properties.Damage.Touch.Min,Properties.Damage.Touch.Max)) or NextInteger(Seed,Properties.Damage.Hit.Min,Properties.Damage.Hit.Max))
if Hum.Health <= 0 and not Hum.Parent:FindFirstChild("Skeleton") then --Turn them into a Skeleton!
--1. Spawn the dummy skeleton --2. Delete the victim's body parts
local VictimCenter = Hum.Parent:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") or Hum.Parent:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Hum.Parent:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")
--print("Turning them into a skeleton")
local SkeleBaseClone = SkeleBase:Clone()
local SkeleScript = Self:WaitForChild("SkeleScript"):Clone()
Create("ObjectValue"){ Name = "Creator", Value = Character, Parent = SkeleScript }
Create("BoolValue"){ Name = "Skeleton", Value = true, Parent = SkeleBaseClone }
if SkeleBaseClone:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then SkeleBaseClone.PrimaryPart = SkeleBaseClone:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") SkeleBaseClone:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(VictimCenter.CFrame) end SkeleBaseClone.Name = "AzureSkeleton"
SkeleScript.Parent = SkeleBaseClone SkeleScript.Disabled = false
SkeleBaseClone.Parent = world
local parts = Hum.Parent:GetDescendants()
for i=1,#parts,1 do
if parts[i] and (parts[i]:IsA("BasePart") or parts[i]:IsA("BaseScript")) then
parts[i]:Destroy()
end
end
if Hum and Hum.Parent and not Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent) then Services.Debris:AddItem(Hum.Parent,5) end
end
end) end
function Unequipped()
for i=1,#Events do if Events[i] then Events[i]:Disconnect() end end Events = {}
for _,anim in Pairs(Animations) do --print(anim.Animation) if anim.Animation then anim.Animation:Stop() end end Animations = {} Properties.Swinging = false Properties.Activating = false end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)

--Initiating the black hole!
local Self = script
local Location,Range,Duration,Creator = Self:FindFirstChild("Location"),Self:FindFirstChild("Range"),Self:FindFirstChild("Duration"),Self:FindFirstChild("Creator")
if not Location or not Range or not Duration or not Creator then Self:Destroy() end
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), ServerScriptService = (game:FindService("ServerScriptService") or game:GetService("ServerScriptService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")) }
Creator = Creator.Value Location = Location.Value Range = Range.Value Duration = Duration.Value
if Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator) then Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator).CharacterAdded:Connect(function(char) Creator = char end) end
local TeamMates = {}
TeamMates[#TeamMates+1] = Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator)
Services.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player) player.CharaterAdded:Connect(function(char) if IsTeamMate(Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator),player) then TeamMates[#TeamMates+1] = char end end) end)
Properties = { MaxSpeed = 80 }
local world = workspace
local Instant,Pairs,Unpack = Instance.new,pairs,unpack
local Type,huge,Vec3,FromRGB,NewColor,Reg3 = type,math.huge,Vector3.new,Color3.fromRGB,Color3.new,Region3.new
local FindPartsInRegion3 = world.FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList
function Create(ty) return function(data) local obj = Instant(ty) for k, v in Pairs(data) do if Type(k) == 'number' then v.Parent = obj else obj[k] = v end end return obj end end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
local Deletables = {}
local Black_Hole_Container = Create("Model"){ Name = "Black Hole", Parent = world } Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Black_Hole_Container
local Singularity = Create("Part"){ Locked = true, Anchored = true, CanCollide = false, CastShadow = false, Name = "Singularity", Material = Enum.Material.Neon, Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball, Transparency = 0, Size = Vec3(1,1,1) * 4, Color = NewColor(0,0,0), CFrame = Location } Black_Hole_Container.PrimaryPart = Singularity Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Singularity
local Center = Create("Attachment"){ Position = Vec3(0,0,0), Name = "Center", Parent = Singularity } Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Center
local Range_Indicator = Create("Part"){ Locked = true, Anchored = true, CastShadow = false, CanCollide = false, Name = "Range_Indicator", Material = Enum.Material.ForceField, Size = Vec3(1,1,1), Transparency = .9, Color = FromRGB(170, 0, 170), CFrame = Location, } Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Range_Indicator
local Range_Mesh = Create("SpecialMesh"){ MeshType = Enum.MeshType.Sphere, Scale = Vec3(1,1,1) * Range, Parent = Range_Indicator } Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Range_Mesh
local EffectsFolder = Self:WaitForChild("Effects"):GetChildren() for i=1, #EffectsFolder,1 do if EffectsFolder[i] then EffectsFolder[i].Parent = Center if EffectsFolder[i]:IsA("ParticleEmitter") then EffectsFolder[i].Enabled = true elseif EffectsFolder[i]:IsA("Sound") then EffectsFolder[i]:Play() end end end
Singularity.Parent = Black_Hole_Container Range_Indicator.Parent = Black_Hole_Container
local DarkFire = Create("Fire"){ Color = FromRGB(72, 0, 255), SecondaryColor = NewColor(0,0,1), }
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in Pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
local Touched_Parts = {}
Singularity.Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent or hit:IsDescendantOf(Creator) or IsInTable(Touched_Parts, hit) then return end
local Hum,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"), hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField")
if Hum and Hum.Parent ~= Creator and Hum.Health > 0 and not FF and not IsTeamMate(Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator),Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator)) Hum.Parent:BreakJoints() end
if not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0 or not FF then Touched_Parts[#Touched_Parts+1] = hit --print(IsInTable(Touched_Parts, hit)) hit:BreakJoints() DarkFire:Clone().Parent = hit DarkFire.Enabled = true hit.Color = FromRGB(98, 37, 209)
local Scripts = hit:GetDescendants()
for i=1,#Scripts,1 do if Scripts[i] and Scripts[i]:IsA("BaseScript") then Scripts[i]:Destroy() end end
if hit:IsA("UnionOperation") then hit.UsePartColor = true end
Services.Debris:AddItem(hit,1.5) end
end)
local Current_Time = 0
local Captured_Forces = {}
repeat
--Place portal logic here
local Captured_Parts = {}
for i=1,#Captured_Forces,1 do --Remove parts that are not in range, otherwise update the forces/blacklist parts if Captured_Forces[i] and Captured_Forces[i].Parent and Captured_Forces[i].Parent:IsA("BasePart") then if (Captured_Forces[i].Parent.Position-Singularity.Position).Magnitude > Range then --Let the part free --print("Releasing from grasp") Captured_Forces[i]:Destroy() else --Captured_Forces[i].Parent.Velocity = Vec3(0,0,0) Captured_Forces[i].Velocity = (Singularity.Position-Captured_Forces[i].Parent.Position).Unit*(1-((Captured_Forces[i].Parent.Position-Singularity.Position).Magnitude/Range))*Properties.MaxSpeed Captured_Parts[#Captured_Parts+1] = Captured_Forces[i].Parent end end end
local Region = Reg3(Singularity.Position - Vec3(1,1,1) * (Range * .5), Singularity.Position + Vec3(1,1,1) *(Range*.5)) local Cast = FindPartsInRegion3(world,Region,{Unpack(TeamMates),Unpack(Captured_Parts)},huge)
for i=1,#Cast,1 do if Cast[i] and not Cast[i].Anchored and Cast[i].Parent and (Cast[i].Position - Singularity.Position).Magnitude <= Range and not Cast[i]:IsDescendantOf(Creator) and (not Cast[i]:FindFirstAncestorWhichIsA("Accoutrement") and not Cast[i]:FindFirstAncestorWhichIsA("Tool")) then
local Hum,FF = Cast[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"), Cast[i].Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField")
if Hum and Hum.Parent and (Hum.Health == huge or Hum.MaxHealth == huge) and not FF and not IsTeamMate(Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator),Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Hum.Parent)) then --Cheating aren't ya?! UntagHumanoid(Hum) TagHumanoid(Hum,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator)) Hum.Parent:BreakJoints() end
if not FF then
local Forces = Cast[i]:GetChildren()
for i=1,#Forces,1 do if Forces[i] and Forces[i]:IsA("BodyMover") then Forces[i]:Destroy() end end
local Gravitation = Create("BodyVelocity"){ MaxForce = Vec3(1,1,1)*huge, Velocity = (Singularity.Position-Cast[i].Position).Unit*(1-((Cast[i].Position-Singularity.Position).Magnitude/Range))*Properties.MaxSpeed, Name = "Black Hole Gravitation", Parent = Cast[i] } --[[if Cast[i]:CanSetNetworkOwnership() then Cast[i]:SetNetworkOwner(nil) end]]
Deletables[#Deletables+1] = Gravitation Captured_Forces[#Captured_Forces+1] = Gravitation
end
end end
Current_Time = Current_Time + Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until Current_Time >= Duration or not Singularity or not Singularity.Parent or not Range_Indicator or not Range_Indicator.Parent
for i=1,#Deletables,1 do if Deletables[i] then Deletables[i]:Destroy() end end
Deletables = {}
Self:Destroy()

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.
Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by TakeoHonorable
local Properties = { DetectionRange = 75, Damage = 15, RefreshRate = 1/10, Attack_Speed = .3 }
local Self = script
local world = workspace
local Char = Self.Parent
local Hum = Char:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
Hum.HealthDisplayType = Enum.HumanoidHealthDisplayType.AlwaysOn Hum.DisplayDistanceType = Enum.HumanoidDisplayDistanceType.Subject Hum.NameOcclusion = Enum.NameOcclusion.NoOcclusion Hum.NameDisplayDistance = 0 Hum.MaxHealth = 500 Hum.Health = Hum.MaxHealth
local Root = Char:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart")
local Creator = Self:FindFirstChild("Creator")
if not Hum or not Creator then Self:Destroy() end
Creator = Creator.Value
local Invincibility = Instance.new("ForceField") Invincibility.Visible = false Invincibility.Parent = Char
local Seed = Random.new()
local NextNumber = Seed.NextNumber
local Pcall,Pairs,Type,remove,wrap,Wait,Vec3,Delay,huge,ray,HumanEnums = pcall,pairs,type,table.remove,coroutine.wrap,wait,Vector3.new,delay,math.huge,Ray.new,Enum.HumanoidStateType
local FindPartOnRay = world.FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList
local Services = { RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), Debris = (game:FindService("Debris") or game:GetService("Debris")), InsertService = (game:FindService("InsertService") or game:GetService("InsertService")) }
local Accessory = 36883367
local SkeleColor = Color3.fromRGB(98, 37, 209)
local _,Hat = Pcall(function() return Services.InsertService:LoadAsset(Accessory) end)
if Type(Hat) == "userdata" then local Skull = Hat:FindFirstChildOfClass("Accessory") if Skull then local Mesh = Skull:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("SpecialMesh",true) if Mesh then Mesh.Parent.Color = SkeleColor --Mesh.VertexColor = Vec3(170/255,0/255,170/255) Mesh.TextureId = "" end Hum:AddAccessory(Skull) end Hat:Destroy() end
local Packages = {36781407,36781447,36781481,36781518,36781360}
for i=1,#Packages do local _,SkelePackages = Pcall(function() return Services.InsertService:LoadAsset(Packages[i]) end) if Type(SkelePackages) == "userdata" then local R15 = SkelePackages:FindFirstChild("R15",true) if R15 then for _,part in Pairs(R15:GetChildren()) do if part:IsA("BasePart") then if part:IsA("MeshPart") then part.TextureID = "" end local LimbtoReplace = Hum:GetBodyPartR15(Char:FindFirstChild(part.Name)) if LimbtoReplace then Hum:ReplaceBodyPartR15(LimbtoReplace,part) end end end end SkelePackages:Destroy() end end
local Animations = { Idle = Hum:LoadAnimation(Self:WaitForChild("Idle")), Run = Hum:LoadAnimation(Self:WaitForChild("Run")), Jump = Hum:LoadAnimation(Self:WaitForChild("Jump")), Swim = Hum:LoadAnimation(Self:WaitForChild("Swim")), Walk = Hum:LoadAnimation(Self:WaitForChild("Walk")), Fall = Hum:LoadAnimation(Self:WaitForChild("Fall")), Climb = Hum:LoadAnimation(Self:WaitForChild("Climb")) }
Animations.Idle:Play(nil,nil,NextNumber(Seed,.5,1))
Hum:SetStateEnabled(Enum.HumanoidStateType.FallingDown,false)
Services.Debris:AddItem(Invincibility,2)
delay(60,function() Char:Destroy() if Self then Self:Destroy() end end)
local CurrentTarget = nil
local HitHumanoids = {}
local TouchConnections = {}
local function StopAllAnimations() for _,v in Pairs(Animations) do if v then v:Stop() end end end
function IsInTable(Table,Value) for _,v in Pairs(Table) do if v == Value then return true end end return false end
function IsTeamMate(Player1, Player2) return (Player1 and Player2 and not Player1.Neutral and not Player2.Neutral and Player1.TeamColor == Player2.TeamColor) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Services.Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in Pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function FindClosestPlayer(Location,Range) local ClosestPlayer,ClosestTorso,ClosestRange = nil,nil,(Range or huge) local players = Services.Players:GetPlayers() for i=1,#players do if players[i] and players[i].Character and players[i] ~= Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator) and Root then local Hum,FF,Torso = players[i].Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),players[i].Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField"),(players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or players[i].Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso")) if Torso and Torso.Transparency <= .5 then local distance = (Root.Position-Torso.Position).Magnitude if Hum and Hum.Health > 0 and not FF and distance < ClosestRange then ClosestRange = distance ClosestPlayer = players[i] ClosestTorso = Torso end end end end return ClosestPlayer,ClosestTorso end
local function IsAttackable(Character) --Is this Character a teammate,the creator or another zombie that the creator is in possesion? --Will fill in on this later... if Hum.Health <= 0 then return false end
local Hum = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0 then return false end if IsTeamMate(Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character),Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator)) then return false end
local CreatorTag = Character:FindFirstChild("Creator",true) if CreatorTag and (CreatorTag.Value == Creator or CreatorTag.Value == Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator)) then return false end
if Hum.Parent == Creator then return false end
return true end
local SkeleParts = Char:GetDescendants() local Particle = Self:WaitForChild("Particle"):Clone() for i=1,#SkeleParts do if SkeleParts[i] and SkeleParts[i]:IsA("BasePart") then local ParticleClone = Particle:Clone() ParticleClone.Parent = SkeleParts[i] ParticleClone.Enabled = true SkeleParts[i].Anchored = false if SkeleParts[i]:CanSetNetworkOwnership() then SkeleParts[i]:SetNetworkOwner(nil) end end end
for i=1,#SkeleParts do if SkeleParts[i] and SkeleParts[i]:IsA("BasePart") then TouchConnections[#TouchConnections+1] = SkeleParts[i].Touched:Connect(function(hit) if not hit or not hit.Parent then return end local Humanoid,FF = hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid"),hit.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("ForceField") if not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health <= 0 or FF or not IsAttackable(hit.Parent) or IsInTable(HitHumanoids,Humanoid) then return end --print(IsInTable(HitHumanoids,Humanoid)) HitHumanoids[#HitHumanoids+1] = Humanoid UntagHumanoid(Humanoid) TagHumanoid(Humanoid,Services.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Creator)) --print(Properties.Damage) Humanoid:TakeDamage(Properties.Damage) Delay(Properties.Attack_Speed,function() for ii=1,#HitHumanoids do if HitHumanoids[ii] and HitHumanoids[ii] == Humanoid then remove(HitHumanoids,ii) end end end) end) end end
Hum.Changed:Connect(function(property) --Make it look more realistic if property == "WalkSpeed" then if Animations.Run.IsPlaying then Animations.Run:AdjustSpeed(Hum.WalkSpeed/16) end elseif property == "Sit" then Delay(3,function() -- Will get up after X Seconds Hum.Sit = false end) end end)
Hum.StateChanged:Connect(function(old,new)
if old == HumanEnums.Swimming then Animations.Swim:Stop() elseif old == HumanEnums.Jumping then Animations.Jump:Stop() elseif old == HumanEnums.Freefall then Animations.Fall:Stop() elseif old == HumanEnums.Climbing then Animations.Climb:Stop() end
if new == HumanEnums.Swimming then Animations.Swim:Play(nil,2,Hum.WalkSpeed/16) elseif new == HumanEnums.Jumping then Animations.Jump:Play(nil,2,1) elseif new == HumanEnums.Freefall then Animations.Fall:Play(nil,2,1) elseif new == HumanEnums.Climbing then Animations.Climb:Play(nil,2,1) end
end)
local CurrentTarget
wrap(function() repeat local hit,pos,nor = FindPartOnRay(world,ray(Root.Position,Root.Velocity),{Char,(CurrentTarget and CurrentTarget.Parent) or nil},false,true) if hit and not Hum.Jump then Hum.Jump = true end Services.RunService.Heartbeat:Wait() until not Hum or not Hum.Parent or Hum.Health <= 0 end)()
repeat local TargetPlayer,TargetTorso = FindClosestPlayer(Root.Position,Properties.DetectionRange) for i=1,#SkeleParts do if SkeleParts[i] and SkeleParts[i]:IsA("BasePart") then if SkeleParts[i]:CanSetNetworkOwnership() then SkeleParts[i]:SetNetworkOwner(nil) end end end --print(TargetPlayer,TargetTorso) if TargetPlayer and TargetTorso then --Pursue the target Hum:MoveTo(TargetTorso.Position,TargetTorso) if not Animations.Run.IsPlaying then StopAllAnimations() Hum.WalkSpeed = 30 Animations.Run:Play(nil,nil,Hum.WalkSpeed/16) end else --No Target Found if CurrentTarget then Hum:MoveTo(Root.Position,Root) if not Animations.Idle.IsPlaying then StopAllAnimations() Animations.Idle:Play(nil,nil,NextNumber(Seed,.5,1)) end
else --roam to a random spot Wait(Seed:NextInteger(1,2)) if not Animations.Walk.IsPlaying then StopAllAnimations() Hum:MoveTo(Root.Position+Vec3(NextNumber(Seed,-20,20),0,NextNumber(Seed,-20,20))) Hum.WalkSpeed = Seed:NextInteger(8,16) Animations.Walk:Play(nil,nil,Hum.WalkSpeed/16) wrap(function() Hum.MoveToFinished:Wait() StopAllAnimations() Animations.Idle:Play(nil,nil,Seed:NextNumber(.5,1)) end)()
end end
end CurrentTarget = TargetTorso Wait(Properties.RefreshRate) until not Char or not Char.Parent or not Hum or Hum.Health <= 0
for i=1,#TouchConnections,1 do if TouchConnections[i] then TouchConnections[i]:Disconnect() end end
Services.Debris:AddItem(Char,5) Self:Destroy()--Making sure this doesn't linger

Properties.string: Particle texture must be 1024 by 1024 to use flipbooks.

Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Mouse_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png" Reloading_Icon = "rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png"
Tool = script.Parent
Mouse = nil
function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and Mouse_Icon or Reloading_Icon end end
function OnEquipped(ToolMouse) Mouse = ToolMouse UpdateIcon() end
function OnChanged(Property) if Property == "Enabled" then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

local Tool = script.Parent
local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote",10)
--local MouseInput = Tool:WaitForChild("MousePos",10)
local Services = { Players = (game:FindService("Players") or game:GetService("Players")), TweenService = (game:FindService("TweenService") or game:GetService("TweenService")), RunService = (game:FindService("RunService") or game:GetService("RunService")), Input = (game:FindService("ContextActionService") or game:GetService("ContextActionService")) }
local Player,Character,Humanoid
function Primary(actionName, inputState, inputObj) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer(Enum.KeyCode.Q) end end
function Equipped() Player = Services.Players.LocalPlayer Character = Player.Character Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if not Humanoid or not Humanoid.Parent or Humanoid.Health <= 0 then return end
Services.Input:BindAction("Primary",Primary,true,Enum.KeyCode.Q,Enum.KeyCode.ButtonX) Services.Input:SetTitle("Primary","Black hole") Services.Input:SetPosition("Primary",UDim2.new(.5,0,-.5,0)) end
function Unequipped() Services.Input:UnbindAction("Primary") end
Tool.Equipped:Connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:Connect(Unequipped)
--[[function MouseInput.OnClientInvoke() return game.Players.LocalPlayer:GetMouse().Hit.p end]]
